body_html:
The way we keep training graph is that we call estimator.train only once. We need to call evaluation repeatedly (for each checkpoint). So if we want to keep the same graph we need to access the graph created within estimator.evaluate. Estimator does recreate graph for every call of evaluate/train by design.
…

body:
The way we keep training graph is that we call estimator.train only once.
We need to call evaluation repeatedly (for each checkpoint). So if we want
to keep the same graph we need to access the graph created within
estimator.evaluate. Estimator does recreate graph for every call of
evaluate/train by design.
